EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - What’s New in 8.3 Service Pack 1 - APAC - 2015.02.19.Email - Last Call
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Thursday: What's New in 8.3 Service Pack 1? Join our Webinar to find out!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Webinar: What’s New in 8.3 Service Pack 1
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
Tricentis would like to wish you a happy new year by presenting our new 8.3 Service Pack 1 Release. The new year brings many new features to help enhance the Tosca Testsuite experience. We are offering an exclusive sneak peek of all our cool new features through our ‘What’s New’ Webinar.
Our Co-Managing Directors of Asia-Pacific, Dominik Weissboeck and Thomas Hadorn will be walking you through all our new features, which will include:
- X-Scan - Support: Siebel Open UI - Taas with Web Automation - Image Based Test Automation - Extras: Loops & Conditions, Mobile+
Our ‘What’s New’ Webinar will take place on February 19, 2015 starting at 1:00 p.m. Sydney time. Don’t miss out!
We look forward to seeing you at our webinar! Best regard s, The Tricentis Webinar Team
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-apac.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
<http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-whats-new-in-8-3-service-pack-1-apac.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=db>
Thu, Feb 19, 2015 1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. (Sydney) 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. (Perth, Singapore) 3:00 p.m. – 4:00 p.m. (New Zealand)
Dominik Weissboeck Co-Managing Director of Asia-Pacific Tricentis
Thomas Hadorn Co-Managing Director of Asia-Pacific Tricentis
